import math

def nCr(n,r):
    f = math.factorial
    return (f(n)/(f(r)*f(n-r)))

for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    scores = sorted(map(int, raw_input().split()))
    k = int(raw_input())
    ctr = 0
    j = 10
    while k > 0:
        temp = scores.count(scores[j])
        if k < temp:
            ctr += nCr(temp,k)
            break
        else:
            k -= temp
            j -= temp
    if ctr == 0:
        print 1
    else:
        print ctr
